summary.intent: Implement three UX improvements to the Past Remediations panel: add a clickable link from score comparisons to evaluation results, increase header text sizes for better visual hierarchy, and auto-open the panel when no issues are selected.
summary.outcome: All three changes were implemented successfully across RemediationHistoryCard.tsx, RemediationHistory.tsx, and RemediateTab.tsx. 1309 tests passed, lint was clean after auto-fix, and changes were committed as af5e09e with pre-commit hooks passing.

repo: Project uses Biome for linting with auto-fix available via `bun run lint:fix`
Pre-commit hooks enforce tests, lint, and typecheck before every commit
Test suite has 1309 tests run via `bun run test`
RemediationHistory component uses a `collapsed` boolean state to control panel visibility
ScoreComparison component sits inside RemediationHistoryCard and receives resultEvaluationId/impactJobId for linking to /evaluation/{id}

code.finding: ScoreComparison is wrapped in an <a> tag linking to /evaluation/{resultEvaluationId || impactJobId} with hover underline styling
Header text sizes: remediation label bumped to text-base font-semibold, stat label and metadata row bumped to text-sm, ScoreComparison text bumped to text-sm
Added defaultOpen prop; collapsed state now initialized from defaultOpen instead of always true
Passes defaultOpen={selectedIssueKeys.size === 0} to RemediationHistory so panel auto-opens when no issues are selected

workflow: Biome lint can flag long className strings and requires wrapping; `bun run lint:fix` resolves these automatically
The `rtk` command prefix was attempted first for test/git commands before falling back to direct commands — likely a remote/tunneling wrapper that wasn't needed in this context

friction: First test run used `rtk bun run test` which required a fallback to plain `bun run test`, suggesting `rtk` prefix doesn't work transparently for all commands
Biome lint failed on initial check due to long className needing wrapping, requiring a separate lint:fix step before the lint pass was clean
Pre-existing uncommitted changes in PatchDownload.tsx were present and got bundled into the commit even though they were unrelated to the current task
open_items: PatchDownload.tsx was committed alongside the remediation UI changes but its modifications were not described — the intent and correctness of those pre-existing changes should be verified
The `rtk` command wrapper behavior is unclear; worth investigating whether it should work for `bun` subcommands or only for git
